revised_title: Observations on Stones Resembling Giants-Causey in Ireland
tldr: The author, Abraham Trembly, explores and describes stones resembling those of the Giants-Causey in Ireland found in the country of Nassau, territories of Treves, and Colen. He discusses their hexagonal shapes, formation, and use in buildings and pavements. The stones are identified as a type of basalts, and their crystallization is compared to other natural minerals.
